languages.text: {n}Вдохновительница толпы, дама в золотой маске, громко возмущается:{/n} "Как поет этот проходимец! Думает, если его отмыли от нечистот, значит, он стал похожим на дворянина!" {n}Заметив вас, знать расступается. Дама капризно тянет:{/n} "Пусть Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} отметит чернь клеймом!"

{n}The mob's instigator, a lady in a golden mask, exclaims furiously,{/n} "Oh, listen to the songs of this poor wretch! He thinks that the bath they gave him makes him look like a nobleman!" {n}Upon noticing you, the crowd parts. In a peevish voice, the woman drawls,{/n} "We ask that our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} brand this peasant!"
languages.original_text: {n}Вдохновительница толпы, дама в золотой маске, громко возмущается:{/n} "Как поет этот проходимец! Думает, если его отмыли от нечистот, значит, он стал похожим на дворянина!" {n}Заметив вас, знать расступается. Дама капризно тянет:{/n} "Пусть Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} отметит чернь клеймом!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The crowd's instigator, a lady in a golden mask, exclaims furiously,{/n} "Oh, listen to the songs of this chimney-sweep! He thinks that the bath they gave him makes him look like a nobleman!" {n}Upon noticing you, the crowd parts. The woman drawls in a peevish voice,{/n} "We ask that our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} brand the peasant!"

languages.text: {n}而这群人的煽动者，一位戴着金色面具的女士，愤怒地高喊起来。{/n}“听听这个贱民编出来的谎话吧！莫非他以为，那些人给他洗了个澡，他就真的变成贵族了？”{n}此时，人们注意到了你的到来，纷纷散开。戴着金色面具的女士以抱怨的口吻，慢吞吞地开了口。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊，我们请求您，将印记打在这个农奴身上吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}The mob's instigator, a lady in a golden mask, exclaims furiously,{/n} "Oh, listen to the songs of this poor wretch! He thinks that the bath they gave him makes him look like a nobleman!" {n}Upon noticing you, the crowd parts. In a peevish voice, the woman drawls,{/n} "We ask that our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} brand this peasant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}而这群人的煽动者，一位戴着金色面具的女士，愤怒地高喊起来。{/n}“听听这个贱民编出来的谎话吧！莫非他以为，那些人给他洗了个澡，他就真的变成贵族了？”{n}此时，人们注意到了你的到来，纷纷散开。戴着金色面具的女士以抱怨的口吻，慢吞吞地开了口。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊，我们请求您，将印记打在这个农奴身上吧！”
{n}而这群人的煽动者，一位戴着金色面具的女士，愤怒地高喊起来。{/n}“听听这个扫烟囱的人编出来的谎话吧！莫非他以为，那些人给他洗了个澡，他就真的变成贵族了？”{n}此时，人们注意到了你的到来，纷纷散开。戴着金色面具的女士以抱怨的口吻，慢吞吞地开了口。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊，我们请求您，将印记打在这个农奴身上吧！”
{n}而这群人的煽动者，一位戴着金色面具的女士，愤怒地高喊起来。{/n}“听听这个扫烟囱的人编出来的谎话吧！莫非他以为，那些人给他洗了个澡，他就真的变成贵族了？”{n}此时，人们注意到了你的到来，纷纷散开。戴着金色面具的女士以抱怨的口吻，慢吞吞地开了口。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊，我们请求您，将印记打在这个农奴身上吧！”

languages.text: {n}暴徒を扇動した黄金の仮面の女が激しく叫んだ。{/n}「おやおや、このクソ野郎の歌をお聞きなさいよ！湯に浸かっただけで、自分が貴族に見えるとでも思ってるのよ！」{n}あなたに気づくと、群衆は道を開けた。女は不機嫌そうな声で間延びした口調で言った。{/n}「この農民に、我らが天の{mf|君|姫}の刻印を押すよう求めます！」
languages.original_text: {n}The mob's instigator, a lady in a golden mask, exclaims furiously,{/n} "Oh, listen to the songs of this poor wretch! He thinks that the bath they gave him makes him look like a nobleman!" {n}Upon noticing you, the crowd parts. In a peevish voice, the woman drawls,{/n} "We ask that our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} brand this peasant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}暴徒を扇動した黄金の仮面の女が激しく叫んだ。{/n}「おやおや、この煙突掃除人の歌をお聞きなさいよ！湯に浸かっただけで、自分が貴族に見えるとでも思ってるのよ！」{n}あなたに気づくと、群衆は道を開けた。女は不機嫌そうな声で間延びした口調で言った。{/n}「この農民に、我らが天の{mf|君|姫}の刻印を押すよう求めます！」
{n}暴徒を扇動した黄金の仮面の女が激しく叫んだ。{/n}「おやおや、この煙突掃除人の歌をお聞きなさいよ！湯に浸かっただけで、自分が貴族に見えるとでも思ってるのよ！」{n}あなたに気づくと、群衆は道を開けた。女は不機嫌そうな声で間延びした口調で言った。{/n}「この農民に、我らが天の{mf|君|姫}の刻印を押すよう求めます！」

languages.text: {n}La instigadora del gentío, una mujer con una máscara dorada, exclama furiosa:{/n} «¡Oh, escuchad la cantinela de este desdichado! ¡Se cree que puede pasar por noble porque alguien le ha dado un baño!». {n}Al percatarse de tu presencia, la muchedumbre se hace a los lados para dejarte paso. La mujer continúa irritada:{/n} «¡Solicitamos que {mf|nuestro Señor|nuestra Señora} Celestial marque a este plebeyo!».
languages.original_text: {n}The mob's instigator, a lady in a golden mask, exclaims furiously,{/n} "Oh, listen to the songs of this poor wretch! He thinks that the bath they gave him makes him look like a nobleman!" {n}Upon noticing you, the crowd parts. In a peevish voice, the woman drawls,{/n} "We ask that our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} brand this peasant!"

languages.text: {n}Kalabalığın başındaki altın maskeli bir kadın, öfkeyle haykırıyor.{/n} "Hele şu zavallıcığın ötüşüne bakın! Ona yaptırdıkları banyonun kendisini soylu gibi gösterdiğini sanıyor!" {n}Seni fark edince kalabalık ikiye ayrılıyor. Kadın, hırçın bir sesle kelimeleri uzatarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuzdan|Leydimizden} bu köylüyü damgalamasını rica ediyoruz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The mob's instigator, a lady in a golden mask, exclaims furiously,{/n} "Oh, listen to the songs of this poor wretch! He thinks that the bath they gave him makes him look like a nobleman!" {n}Upon noticing you, the crowd parts. In a peevish voice, the woman drawls,{/n} "We ask that our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} brand this peasant!"

languages.text: {n}La meneuse, une dame au masque doré, s'exclame avec colère :{/n} « Oh, écoutez les affabulations de ce pauvre hère ! Il s'imagine que le bain qu'on lui a donné suffit à faire de lui un noble ! » {n}La foule s'écarte en remarquant votre présence, tandis que la femme ajoute d'une voix traînante et venimeuse :{/n} « Nous demandons à Votre Céleste Seigneurie de marquer ce paysan ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The mob's instigator, a lady in a golden mask, exclaims furiously,{/n} "Oh, listen to the songs of this poor wretch! He thinks that the bath they gave him makes him look like a nobleman!" {n}Upon noticing you, the crowd parts. In a peevish voice, the woman drawls,{/n} "We ask that our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} brand this peasant!"

languages.text: {n}Angestachelt wird der Mob von einer Dame mit goldener Maske, die nun erbost ruft:{/n} "Oh, hört nur das Lied dieser armen Seele. Er denkt, nur weil sie ihn gebadet haben, sähe er aus wie ein Adeliger!" {n}Als die Gruppe dich bemerkt, macht sie dir Platz. Mürrisch sagt die Frau gedehnt:{/n} "Wir fordern, dass {mf|unser himmlischer Herr|unsere himmlische Herrin} diesen Bauern brandmarkt!"
languages.original_text: {n}The mob's instigator, a lady in a golden mask, exclaims furiously,{/n} "Oh, listen to the songs of this poor wretch! In a peevish voice, the woman drawls,{/n} "We ask that our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} brand this peasant!"
